info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued April 28 at 4:14PM CDT until April 28 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Midland/Odessa TX
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Northwestern Pecos County in southwestern Texas... Southeastern Reeves County in southwestern Texas... Eastern Ward County in western Texas... Northwestern Crane County in western Texas...
* Until 515 PM CDT.
* At 413 PM CDT, a wall of dust was along a line extending from near Saragosa to 11 miles southwest of Grandfalls to 14 miles south of West Odessa, moving northeast at 30 mph.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with damaging wind in excess of 60 mph.
SOURCE...Doppler radar.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 203 and 237. Interstate 20 between mile markers 63 and 88.
Locations impacted include... Monahans, Balmorhea, Thorntonville, Grandfalls, Pyote, Balmorhea Lake, Balmorhea State Park, Saragosa, Wickett, Coyanosa, Imperial Reservoir, Roy Hurd Memorial Airport, Royalty, Verhalen, B F Goodrich Testing Track, Toyahvale, Imperial, Cordona Lake, and Monahans Sandhills State Park.
info.instruction: Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 5:15 PM CDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 5:15 PM CDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

area.areaDesc: Crane, TX; Pecos, TX; Reeves, TX; Ward, TX

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 5:15 PM CDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 5:15 PM CDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.

area.areaDesc: Crane, TX; Pecos, TX; Reeves, TX; Ward, TX
